mapper.sql: a.pid AS "pid", a.p_name AS "pName", a.p_code AS "pCode", a.p_desc AS "pDesc", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM auto_product a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.p_name LIKE '%'||#{pName}||'%' '%'+#{pName}+'%' concat('%',#{pName},'%')
AND a.p_code LIKE '%'||#{pCode}||'%' '%'+#{pCode}+'%' concat('%',#{pCode},'%')
AND a.p_desc LIKE '%'||#{pDesc}||'%' '%'+#{pDesc}+'%' concat('%',#{pDesc},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_product( p_name, p_code, p_desc, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{pName}, #{pCode}, #{pDesc}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_product SET p_name = #{pName}, p_code = #{pCode}, p_desc = #{pDesc}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE pid = #{id}
